title: 关于玩家背包检测
author: iMoonDay
txt_content: 1.14.3版本,我想以所有副手拿着名字叫磁铁,附魔耐久1的指南针的玩家的坐标来执行某个命令怎么写?我自己试了半天附魔加进去就检测失败了.

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
Tip：把那个指南扔出去，用 data get entity @e[limit=1,sort=nearest,type=minecraft:item,distance=..5] Item 就可以得到该物品的标签了。


/execute at @a[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:-106b,id:"minecraft:compass",tag:{Enchantments:[{lvl:1s,id:"minecraft:unbreaking"}],display:{Name:'{"text":"磁铁"}'}}}]}] run say hi

replies.author: iMoonDay
replies.txt_content:
⊙u⊙ 发表于 2019-7-28 17:55
你半天都试了哪些？
execute at @a[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:-106b,id:"minecraft:compass",tag:{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"磁铁\"}"}}}]}] run tp @e[type=minecraft:item,distance=..20] ~ ~ ~
写到这了,附魔不知道放哪

replies.author: Chelover_C60
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 CHElover_C60 于 2019-7-28 18:05 编辑 
execute at @a[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:-106b,id:"minecraft:compass",tag:{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1s}],display:{Name:'{"text":"磁铁"}'}}}]}] run tp @e[type=minecraft:item,distance=..20] ~ ~ ~复制代码

↓我也很无奈啊.

replies.author: iMoonDay
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2019-7-28 18:01
Tip：把那个指南扔出去，用 data get entity @e[limit=1,sort=nearest,type=minecraft:item,distance=..5]  ...
ok没问题了,我刚刚附魔等级没加s一直没反应
